## utils.dom.setCssTransform() function

Sets the CSS transform property on an element. This function sets the non-vendor-prefixed and vendor-prefixed versions for backwards compatibility with older browsers. See https://caniuse.com/\#feat=transforms2d

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setCssTransform(element: Element, transform: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | Element to which the CSS transform will be applied. |
|  transform | string | The value of the CSS <code>transform</code> property.  Blockly.utils.dom.setCssTransform |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
